text.div:
patientDeathDateSearchParameter

Parameter deceased:token

Searches based on whether a patient is marked as deceased. Acceptable values are true or false eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?deceased={boolean}

ResourcePatient
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesPatient
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: patientDeathDateSearchParameter
description: Searches based on whether a patient is marked as deceased. Acceptable values are true or false eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?deceased={boolean}
